customer_name: Levi J Hershberger Freda D Hershberger
site_name: Levi J Hershberger Freda D Hershberger

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
6/3/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on house door, honking horn, waiting 30
minutes ( no phone available to leave message). Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on 
6/3/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on house door, honking horn, waiting 30 
minutes ( no phone available to leave message). Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
